summary: Adds fake shadowing on tree lods with texture changes.
descriptionHtml:
[b]*Change Log*[/b]

v1.2:
- Altered Riften's lod trees even more to remove the orange color and instead make it transitiion better.

v1:
- Initial release


This mod uses a re-textured tree lod from standard def resources for the lod textures used on trees. I made this as I grew tired of seeing bring banana trees in gorgeous Riften's regions. Now they are slightly less banana like. Also the pines are changed also.

I use the draw shadows on tree options so I use this to transition between the lod trees which are actually 2 flat planes in a x position with flat pictures on them.

I may revisit this to try to perfect the image. I am also unsure how the dead trees will look as I am unsure where they are used.

You should see no fps hit, textures are same size as default ones. Meshes for lod stay the same.

If you like the mod, please give me kudos as it encourages me to mod more and bolsters my ego!

Above all, enjoy Skyrim :)
author: Citadel535
